07:15:05 SQL> ALTER SESSION SET NLS_DATE_FORMAT = 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss';

Session altered.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.00
07:15:05 SQL> 07:15:05 SQL> --
07:15:05 SQL> -- merge.sql
07:15:05 SQL> --
07:15:05 SQL> 
07:15:05 SQL> -- I use this script to merge data from ibs_stage into ibs15min.
07:15:05 SQL> 
07:15:05 SQL> 
07:15:05 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_old	  (tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
07:15:05 SQL> -- CREATE TABLE ibs_dups_old(tkr VARCHAR2(8),ydate DATE,clse NUMBER);
07:15:05 SQL> 
07:15:05 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.38
07:15:05 SQL> RENAME ibs15min TO ibs_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.11
07:15:05 SQL> 
07:15:05 SQL> DROP TABLE ibs_dups_old;

Table dropped.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.25
07:15:05 SQL> RENAME ibs_dups TO ibs_dups_old;

Table renamed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.06
07:15:05 SQL> 
07:15:05 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs_dups COMPRESS AS
07:15:05   2  SELECT
07:15:05   3  tkr
07:15:05   4  ,(TO_DATE('1970-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD')+(epochsec/24/3600))ydate
07:15:05   5  ,clse
07:15:05   6  FROM ibs_stage
07:15:05   7  UNION
07:15:05   8  SELECT tkr,ydate,clse
07:15:05   9  FROM ibs_old
07:15:05  10  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.39
07:15:06 SQL> 
07:15:06 SQL> CREATE TABLE ibs15min COMPRESS AS
07:15:06   2  SELECT
07:15:06   3  tkr
07:15:06   4  ,ydate
07:15:06   5  ,AVG(clse)clse
07:15:06   6  FROM ibs_dups
07:15:06   7  GROUP BY tkr,ydate
07:15:06   8  /

Table created.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.25
07:15:06 SQL> 
07:15:06 SQL> ANALYZE TABLE ibs15min COMPUTE STATISTICS;

Table analyzed.

Elapsed: 00:00:00.53
07:15:07 SQL> 
07:15:07 SQL> -- rpt
07:15:07 SQL> 
07:15:07 SQL> SELECT
07:15:07   2  tkr
07:15:07   3  ,(sysdate - MAX(ydate))*24*60 minutes_age
07:15:07   4  ,MIN(ydate)
07:15:07   5  ,COUNT(ydate)
07:15:07   6  ,MAX(ydate)FROM
07:15:07   7  ibs15min
07:15:07   8  GROUP BY tkr
07:15:07   9  /
